name: Lettrier
description:
The Lettrier game is a must-play experience that will test your word-creation skills and take you on a thrilling journey to reach new depths. It was developped for the Global Game Jam 2023

Objective: 

The goal of the game is to dig as deep as possible by forming words from the lands in the grid. The deeper you delve, the more challenging the game becomes, making it a thrilling adventure for players of all skill levels.

How to Play: 

Playing the game is simple and intuitive. All you need to do is hold down the mouse button and slide between the letters downwards to create words with the lands in the grid.

Credits: 

The game was developed with the help of landry_gd and the support of the viewers who greatly assisted in its creation. A special thanks to these individuals for their contributions and support.
